Uses of Class
com.ojcoleman.bain.base.ComponentConfiguration

  • Packages that use ComponentConfiguration 
    Package Description
    com.ojcoleman.bain
    Bain - a neural network simulator.
    com.ojcoleman.bain.base
    Contains the base classes from which most of the components of a neural network are built on or extend from.
    com.ojcoleman.bain.misc
    Contains miscellaneous utility classes and functions.
    com.ojcoleman.bain.neuron.rate  
    com.ojcoleman.bain.neuron.spiking  
    com.ojcoleman.bain.synapse.rate

      Methods in com.ojcoleman.bain.base that return ComponentConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract ComponentConfiguration ComponentConfiguration.createConfiguration()
      Factory method to create a new configuration (typically invoked on a singleton retrieved from myConfigurableComponentCollection.getConfigSingleton()).
      ComponentConfiguration ConfigurableComponentCollection.getComponentConfiguration(int componentIndex)
      Get the configuration for a component.
      abstract ComponentConfiguration ConfigurableComponentCollection.getConfigSingleton()
      Get a reference to the sub-class specific ComponentConfiguration object for this ConfigurableComponentCollection.
      abstract ComponentConfiguration ComponentConfiguration.getPreset(int index)
      Return the configuration preset with the given index (which should generally correspond to the preset names given by getPresetNames().
      ComponentConfiguration[] ComponentConfiguration.getPresets()
      Returns an array containing all the presets available, which should correspond to the preset names given by getPresetNames().
      Methods in com.ojcoleman.bain.base with parameters of type ComponentConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Invoked upon changes to a ComponentConfiguration.
      void ConfigurableComponentCollection.configurationChanged(ComponentConfiguration c)
      This default implementation calls ConfigurableComponentCollection.init() and ComponentCollection.reset().
      void ConfigurableComponentCollection.setConfiguration(int configurationIndex, ComponentConfiguration configurations)
      Replace the specified configuration in the list of known configurations.
